description.@en: Ogres have a natural predilection towards drink. Due to their almost furnace-like guts, they can ignite any alcohol they ingest to shoot it back out as a gout of flame. This is both very dangerous and quite entertaining.

effect.@en: After consuming an entire bottle of rotgut, you can belch it up as flaming breath. Treat this breath as a bottle bomb. However, you must immediately make a Toughness Test or become Intoxicated.
